name.zh_CN: WebTitleIconChanger 网页标题图标修改器

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Protect privacy, improve browsing clarity, and achieve personalized customization by customizing webpage titles and icons.
short.zh_CN: 通过自定义网页标题与图标来保护隐私、提升浏览清晰度，并实现个性化定制，使浏览体验更加独特和高效。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WebTitleIconChanger is a plugin designed to help users easily customize the title and icon (favicon) of any webpage. It helps users achieve the following goals:
1. Personal Privacy Protection: By modifying the webpage title and icon, it prevents others from peeking at your browsing content, ensuring your privacy and security.
2. Enhanced Browsing Clarity: For webpages with similar or confusing titles, you can reset the titles and icons to make browser tabs clearer, improving your work and browsing efficiency.
3. Personalized Experience: Customize the title and icon of each webpage according to your preferences, making your browser interface more personalized and reflecting your unique style.
long.zh_CN:
网页标题图标修改器是一款旨在帮助用户轻松自定义任意网页的标题和图标（favicon）的插件，帮助用户实现以下目标：
1、个人隐私保护：通过修改网页标题和图标，防止旁人窥探你的浏览内容，确保你的隐私安全。
2、浏览清晰度提升：对于那些标题相似或混淆的网页，通过重新设置标题和图标，使浏览器标签页更加清晰明了，提升你的工作和浏览效率。
3、个性化体验：根据你的喜好，自定义每个网页的标题和图标，让你的浏览器界面更加个性化，反映你的独特风格。
